alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Mason (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 6:56PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Meigs, Gallia, southwestern Washington, southeastern Vinton, southern Athens, east central Lawrence, Mason, northeastern Cabell, northwestern Putnam and northwestern Jackson Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 655 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gallipolis, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Pomeroy, Rio Grande, Albany, Racine, Coolville, Rutland, Forked Run State Park, Ravenswood, New Haven, Buffalo, Mason, Tuppers Plains, Middleport, Chester, Syracuse, Hartford City, Crown City and Henderson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
